properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT QNA_NO , QNA_CATEGORY , SPACE_CATEGORY , SPACE_NAME , QNA_TITLE , MEM_ID , QNA_COUNT , QNA_CREATE_DATE FROM TB_QNA B JOIN TB_MEMBER ON (QNA_MEM_NO = MEM_NO) JOIN TB_SPACE ON (QNA_SPACE_NO = SPACE_NO) WHERE B.QNA_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY QNA_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) as "COUNT" FROM TB_QNA WHERE QNA_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT SPACE_NO , SPACE_NAME FROM TB_SPACE WHERE SPACE_CATEGORY = ?
SELECT SPACE_NO , SPACE_NAME FROM TB_SPACE
INSERT INTO TB_QNA ( QNA_NO , QNA_CATEGORY , QNA_SPACE_NO , QNA_TITLE , QNA_CONTENT , QNA_MEM_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_QNNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT SPACE_NAME FROM TB_SPACE WHERE SPACE_NO = ?
INSERT INTO TB_QNA ( QNA_NO , QNA_CATEGORY , QNA_SPACE_NO , QNA_TITLE , QNA_CONTENT , QNA_MEM_NO , QNA_PUBLIC , QNA_PWD ) VALUES ( SEQ_QNNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , 'N' , ? )
INSERT INTO TB_QNA ( QNA_NO , QNA_CATEGORY , QNA_SPACE_NO , QNA_TITLE , QNA_CONTENT , QNA_MEM_NO , QNA_GROUP , QNA_REF_NO ) VALUES ( ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , 1 , ? )
INSERT INTO TB_QNA ( QNA_NO , QNA_CATEGORY , QNA_SPACE_NO , QNA_TITLE , QNA_CONTENT , QNA_MEM_NO , QNA_GROUP , QNA_REF_NO , QNA_PUBLIC , QNA_PWD ) VALUES ( ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , 1 , ? , 'N' , ? )
INSERT INTO TB_FILE ( FILE_NO , REF_BNO , FILE_CATEGORY , FILE_ORIGIN_NAME , FILE_CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH ) VALUES ( SEQ_FINO.NEXTVAL , SEQ_QNNO.CURRVAL , 4 , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO TB_FILE ( FILE_NO , REF_BNO , FILE_CATEGORY , FILE_ORIGIN_NAME , FILE_CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH ) VALUES ( SEQ_FINO.NEXTVAL , ? , 4 , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT FILE_NO , REF_BNO , FILE_ORIGIN_NAME , FILE_CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH FROM TB_FILE WHERE FILE_CATEGORY = 4 AND REF_BNO = ? AND FILE_STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE TB_QNA SET QNA_COUNT = QNA_COUNT+1 WHERE QNA_NO = ? AND QNA_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT QNA_NO , QNA_CATEGORY , SPACE_CATEGORY , SPACE_NO , SPACE_NAME , QNA_TITLE , QNA_CONTENT , MEM_ID , QNA_COUNT , QNA_CREATE_DATE , QNA_PUBLIC , QNA_PWD , QNA_GROUP FROM TB_QNA JOIN TB_MEMBER ON(QNA_MEM_NO = MEM_NO) JOIN TB_SPACE ON (QNA_SPACE_NO = SPACE_NO) WHERE QNA_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM TB_QNA WHERE QNA_NO = ? OR QNA_REF_NO = ?

SELECT QNA_NO , QNA_CATEGORY , SPACE_CATEGORY , SPACE_NAME , QNA_TITLE , MEM_ID , QNA_COUNT , QNA_CREATE_DATE FROM TB_QNA B JOIN TB_MEMBER ON (QNA_MEM_NO = MEM_NO) JOIN TB_SPACE ON (QNA_SPACE_NO = SPACE_NO) WHERE B.QNA_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY QNA_NO DESC

SELECT QNA_NO , QNA_CATEGORY , SPACE_CATEGORY , SPACE_NAME , QNA_TITLE , MEM_ID , QNA_COUNT , QNA_CREATE_DATE FROM TB_QNA B JOIN TB_MEMBER ON (QNA_MEM_NO = MEM_NO) JOIN TB_SPACE ON (QNA_SPACE_NO = SPACE_NO) WHERE B.QNA_STATUS = 'Y' AND QNA_CATEGORY = ? AND SPACE_CATEGORY = ? AND SPACE_NO = ? AND QNA_REF_NO IS NULL ORDER BY QNA_NO DESC

SELECT QNA_NO , QNA_CATEGORY , SPACE_CATEGORY , SPACE_NAME , QNA_TITLE , MEM_ID , QNA_COUNT , QNA_CREATE_DATE FROM TB_QNA B JOIN TB_MEMBER ON (QNA_MEM_NO = MEM_NO) JOIN TB_SPACE ON (QNA_SPACE_NO = SPACE_NO) WHERE B.QNA_STATUS = 'Y' AND QNA_REF_NO IS NULL ORDER BY QNA_NO DESC

SELECT QNA_NO , QNA_CATEGORY , SPACE_CATEGORY , SPACE_NAME , QNA_TITLE , MEM_ID , QNA_COUNT , QNA_CREATE_DATE FROM TB_QNA B JOIN TB_MEMBER ON (QNA_MEM_NO = MEM_NO) JOIN TB_SPACE ON (QNA_SPACE_NO = SPACE_NO) WHERE B.QNA_STATUS = 'Y' AND SPACE_NO = ? ORDER BY QNA_NO DESC

SELECT QNA_NO , QNA_CATEGORY , SPACE_CATEGORY , SPACE_NAME , QNA_TITLE , MEM_ID , QNA_COUNT , QNA_CREATE_DATE FROM TB_QNA B JOIN TB_MEMBER ON (QNA_MEM_NO = MEM_NO) JOIN TB_SPACE ON (QNA_SPACE_NO = SPACE_NO) WHERE B.QNA_STATUS = 'Y' AND SPACE_CATEGORY = ? ORDER BY QNA_NO DESC

SELECT QNA_NO , QNA_CATEGORY , SPACE_CATEGORY , SPACE_NAME , QNA_TITLE , MEM_ID , QNA_COUNT , QNA_CREATE_DATE FROM TB_QNA B JOIN TB_MEMBER ON (QNA_MEM_NO = MEM_NO) JOIN TB_SPACE ON (QNA_SPACE_NO = SPACE_NO) WHERE B.QNA_STATUS = 'Y' AND SPACE_CATEGORY = ? AND SPACE_NO = ? ORDER BY QNA_NO DESC

SELECT QNA_NO , QNA_CATEGORY , SPACE_CATEGORY , SPACE_NAME , QNA_TITLE , MEM_ID , QNA_COUNT , QNA_CREATE_DATE FROM TB_QNA B JOIN TB_MEMBER ON (QNA_MEM_NO = MEM_NO) JOIN TB_SPACE ON (QNA_SPACE_NO = SPACE_NO) WHERE B.QNA_STATUS = 'Y' AND QNA_CATEGORY = ? ORDER BY QNA_NO DESC

SELECT QNA_NO , QNA_CATEGORY , SPACE_CATEGORY , SPACE_NAME , QNA_TITLE , MEM_ID , QNA_COUNT , QNA_CREATE_DATE FROM TB_QNA B JOIN TB_MEMBER ON (QNA_MEM_NO = MEM_NO) JOIN TB_SPACE ON (QNA_SPACE_NO = SPACE_NO) WHERE B.QNA_STATUS = 'Y' AND QNA_CATEGORY = ? AND SPACE_NO = ? ORDER BY QNA_NO DESC

SELECT QNA_NO , QNA_CATEGORY , SPACE_CATEGORY , SPACE_NAME , QNA_TITLE , MEM_ID , QNA_COUNT , QNA_CREATE_DATE FROM TB_QNA B JOIN TB_MEMBER ON (QNA_MEM_NO = MEM_NO) JOIN TB_SPACE ON (QNA_SPACE_NO = SPACE_NO) WHERE B.QNA_STATUS = 'Y' AND QNA_CATEGORY = ? AND SPACE_CATEGORY = ? ORDER BY QNA_NO DESC

SELECT QNA_NO , QNA_CATEGORY , SPACE_CATEGORY , SPACE_NAME , QNA_TITLE , MEM_ID , QNA_COUNT , QNA_CREATE_DATE FROM TB_QNA B JOIN TB_MEMBER ON (QNA_MEM_NO = MEM_NO) JOIN TB_SPACE ON (QNA_SPACE_NO = SPACE_NO) WHERE B.QNA_STATUS = 'Y' AND QNA_CATEGORY = ? AND SPACE_CATEGORY = ? AND SPACE_NO = ? ORDER BY QNA_NO DESC
